MvcUtil
Copyright 2011-2012 Max Toro Q.

CheckBoxListExtensions and RadioButtonListExtensions are based on SelectExtensions 
from ASP.NET MVC by 'Microsoft Corporation' (http://aspnetwebstack.codeplex.com/).

HttpGetHeadAttribute and HttpPatchAttribute are based on HttpGetAttribute 
from ASP.NET MVC by 'Microsoft Corporation' (http://aspnetwebstack.codeplex.com/).

DiskOutputCacheProvider is based on code by 'Scott Mitchell' <mitchell@4guysfromrolla.com>
(http://www.4guysfromrolla.com/articles/061610-1.aspx).

MetadataTypeRegister is based on code by 'bart' (http://stackoverflow.com/a/2657644/39923) 
licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0 (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/).

Additional copyright notices and license terms applicable are
present in the licenses directory of this distribution.
